people_id.description: A people ID to filter the response on

start_date.description: Start of date range in format YYYY-MM-DD. Must be used together with `end_date`

end_date.description: End of date range in format YYYY-MM-DD. Must be used together with `start_date`

status_type_id.description: A status type ID to filter the response on

page.description: The page number of the page of results to return, default `1`

per-page.description: The number of items per page, default is `50`

fields.description: Comma-delimited set of fields to include in the response
